meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Room #1 C- South and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approve minutes from the April 2, 2024, Regular Civil Service Board Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Hearing Item

agenda_items.title: Briefing and Discussion Item
agenda_items.description: Civil Services Rules Revision Update and Department Updates and Announcements including Trial Board Hearings, Workday Implementation and Outstanding Needs, and Departmental Internal Audit Updates.
